How to Install guile-2.2-libs on debian

  • Home
  • debian
  • guile-2.2-libs

Today in this tutorial, I’ll show you how you can install guile-2.2-libs on debian with and without using the command line.

Introduction

Installing guile-2.2-libs on debian is very easy. And with the help of this tutorial, you will be able to easily install, update and uninstall guile-2.2-libs in just a few steps.

In this tutorial I’ll show you four methods to install guile-2.2-libs, the methods are using apt, apt-get, aptitude, and synaptic. All these methods require you to have an active and stable internet connection and sudo permission.

Install guile-2.2-libs Using apt

To install guile-2.2-libs in debian using apt, you will need to run the apt update command first to get the updated list of packages from the repositories.

Copy the command given below and paste it in the command line, then press enter. If you are using the sudo command for the first time then you might also need to enter your root password.

sudo apt update

After you have updated the package list using apt, you can now install guile-2.2-libs using the apt install command. To do that use the command given below.

sudo apt -y install guile-2.2-libs

The installation of guile-2.2-libs might take a little bit of time depending upon your internet connection and machine configuration.

Install guile-2.2-libs Using apt-get

To install guile-2.2-libs using apt-get in debian, you will need to first update the package list using the apt-get update command. Copy, paste, and enter the command given below in the command line.

sudo apt-get update

After updating the package lists, use the apt-get install command given below to install guile-2.2-libs.

sudo apt-get -y install guile-2.2-libs

Install guile-2.2-libs Using Synaptic

To install guile-2.2-libs using Synaptic you will need to first install Synaptic, you can do that by following the instructions from here. After installing synaptic follow the steps below to install guile-2.2-libs on your debian using Synaptic.

You can open synaptic by clicking on the menu icon then searching for synaptic or you can open the command line and enter the command given below –

sudo synaptic

After synaptic opens, click on the search icon and search for guile-2.2-libs. This will display the guile-2.2-libs package in the package window, now to install guile-2.2-libs, click on the checkbox that is on the left side.

Then click on Mark for Installation, this will select the guile-2.2-libs package for installation, now to install it click on the Apply button, you will get a summary window where click on the apply button again to start the download of guile-2.2-libs.

If the download and installation are successful then the checkmark option will turn green.

Install guile-2.2-libs Using aptitude

To install guile-2.2-libs on debian using aptitude, you will need to first install Aptitude in your debian. To install Aptitude follow the instructions here. Once you have aptitude installed proceed to the installation of guile-2.2-libs.

Now you will need to first update your package lists from the repositories, use the apt update command for that, after that update the package list of aptitude using the aptitude update command.

sudo apt update sudo aptitude update

After updating the package list of aptitude, install guile-2.2-libs using the command aptitude install guile-2.2-libs.

sudo aptitude -y install guile-2.2-libs

How to Upgrade guile-2.2-libs on debian

If you want to upgrade the guile-2.2-libs package on your debian to its latest version then here’s how you can do that using apt, apt-get, aptitude, and synaptic.

Upgrade guile-2.2-libs using Apt & Apt-get

To upgrade guile-2.2-libs to its latest version using apt or apt-get, you will need to open the terminal then run the sudo apt update command to update the package list, after that copy and paste the commands given below to upgrade guile-2.2-libs.

sudo apt install --only-upgrade guile-2.2-libs sudo apt-get install --only-upgrade guile-2.2-libs

Upgrade guile-2.2-libs using Aptitude

To upgrade guile-2.2-libs using aptitude you will need to again run the update command to update the package list, use command sudo aptitude update to do that. After that run the command given below to upgrade guile-2.2-libs.

sudo aptitude -y full-upgrade guile-2.2-libs

Upgrade guile-2.2-libs using Synaptic

To upgrade guile-2.2-libs using synaptic open synaptic using the command sudo synaptic or by going to the menu and searching for synaptic.

In synaptic click on the reload button, this will look for updates. After that you will need to search for guile-2.2-libs, now right-click guile-2.2-libs, and click on the mark for upgrade option.

Now to upgrade guile-2.2-libs just click on the apply button, then click on the apply button again in the summary screen.

How To Uninstall guile-2.2-libs on debian

If you want to remove and uninstall guile-2.2-libs from your debian then here’s how you can do that. To remove just guile-2.2-libs, you can use the command that is given below, copy the command, paste it in the command line then press enter.

sudo apt remove guile-2.2-libs

Remove related packages, dependencies & configuration files of guile-2.2-libs

To remove all the related packages, dependencies and configuration files of guile-2.2-libs you can use the command given below.

sudo apt -y purge guile-2.2-libs

Remove guile-2.2-libs using Synaptic Package Manager

You can also uninstall guile-2.2-libs using the synaptic package manager, first open synaptic using the command sudo synaptic or search and open it directly.

After that in synaptic search for guile-2.2-libs, right-click the guile-2.2-libs package and click on the Mark for Complete Removal option. Now to uninstall guile-2.2-libs click on the apply button then in summary click on apply again.

Conclusion

That is how you can install guile-2.2-libs on debian using the command line or using the synaptic package manager. I also showed you how you can uninstall and upgrade guile-2.2-libs using the command line or using the synaptic package manager.

If you need any help regarding the installation of guile-2.2-libs then send me a mail at netmikoblog@gmail.com, thank you.
